        public void backFromEngagement(EngagementResultAPI result)
        Description copied from interface: InteractionDialogPlugin
        Get's called after a fleet battle connected to this dialog ends. Can be left empty if the dialog you are implementing isn't related to a fleet battle. This documentation is incomplete.

        public void optionSelected(java.lang.String text,
                           java.lang.Object optionData)
        Description copied from interface: InteractionDialogPlugin
        This gets called when the player clicks on an option. Execute the logic for the selected option in here
        Specified by:
        optionSelected in interface InteractionDialogPlugin
        Parameters:
        text - the name of the option, i.e. the first argument passed to addOption
        optionData - the data/identifier of the selected option. Cast this to the correct type. Don't forget to null-check the result of the cast.
